content.html: Someone paid $650,000 for a virtual mega-yacht. I repeat: the yacht does not exist beyond a virtual world called “The Sandbox.” Every time I see a story like this I not only think we need to rein this in, but also that taxing the rich isn’t enough; we need expropriation.
content.value:
Someone paid $650,000 for a virtual mega-yacht. I repeat: the yacht does not exist beyond a virtual world called “The Sandbox.”

Every time I see a story like this I not only think we need to rein this in, but also that taxing the rich isn’t enough; we need expropriation.

content.html: Some people can't even afford their medical or grocery bills while others drop $650k on a fake boat. This is the worst timeline.
content.value:
Some people can't even afford their medical or grocery bills while others drop $650k on a fake boat.

This is the worst timeline.
